title: The Turnstile of Time
description: Nathan Lee's search for happiness in life and love begins when Nathan, an American, travels to Oxford University for graduate study. In this hallowed haven he finds intellectual inspiration as well as many occasions for irreverent humor. Nathan befriends a Mafia family s prodigy son whose bawdy behavior and disruptive shenanigans cause turmoil throughout the University. The unlikely bond between the gentlemanly Nathan and his cunning companion endures for a lifetime. At Oxford, Nathan encounters an alluring but mysterious beauty, the first of three women whose lives will intertwine with his own. This cosmopolitan tale will lead you on an amorous odyssey, a road that winds its way through a sorrowful interlude on the East Coast of America to lasting fulfillment in the Wild West.
author: David P. Boyd
